ygData.subject: re: GNOME PARTIES!!!
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh yeah, we gotta have a monthly Gnomestock! I say we throw the first one on Bertoxx since there are a lot of gnomes on this list and on that server and it is
ygData.messageBody:
Oh yeah, we gotta have a monthly Gnomestock!

I say we throw the first one on Bertoxx since there are a lot of gnomes on
this list and on that server and it is the first server alphabetically
anyways.

And I agree the date should be easy to remember so I vote for the First of
every month. That way people who have something else they should be doing
on Saturdays (I am not sure what that would be but I've heard that there are
people who do something other that work and play EQ) will be able to make
it. Plus, that is closer than the first Saturday of November.

I know nothing about organizing an event on EQ but I am willing to help out
anyway I can.

Akel, gnome wizard
Bertoxxulous
